title: Maricopa's a county recorder with a personal contact with Clinton?
subtitle: Rumor has it that Maricopa's registered to Helen Purcell County has connections to the Clinton campaign through her late husband Joe Purcell.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Maricopa's registered Helen Purcell county was married to Joe Purcell, former Vice Governor of Arkansas, who served under Bill Clinton.
